planet.name: tau Ceti b
HD 10700 b
planet.description: Multiple periodic signals were found by Tuomi et al. in 2012 in the radial velocity data from HARPS, AAPS and HIRES. The planetary nature of the signals has yet to be confirmed.
planet.imagedescription:
Artist's impression of the Tau Ceti system
Picture credit: J. Pinfield for the RoPACS network at the University of Hertfordshire, 2012.

planet.name: tau Ceti g
HD 10700 g
planet.description: Analysis of the Tau Ceti RV data taking into account wavelength-dependent noise indicated a four planet system around the star. Two of the previously-detected planets (e and f) were confirmed, while two new planets were found, designated g and h to avoid confusion with the previous candidates.

planet.name: tau Ceti h
HD 10700 h
planet.description: Analysis of the Tau Ceti RV data taking into account wavelength-dependent noise indicated a four planet system around the star. Two of the previously-detected planets (e and f) were confirmed, while two new planets were found, designated g and h to avoid confusion with the previous candidates.
